messages.title: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY’S PRIORITIES
messages.content: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. LET’S GET ON WITH OUR PRIORITIES.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fay will ensure that farmers across Brecon and Radnorshire have the tools and support they need. Ensuring future trade deals allow British farmers to compete on an even playing field.
Fay will use her experience in telecommunications to deliver better broadband and mobile coverage. With more reliable broadband, small businesses can upscale their growth reaching new customers.
Fay believes we need to act to prevent further damage. Fay will work to phase out coal power stations and gas heating. Incentivize electric vehicle adoption.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament.

issues.brexitEurope: SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote
issues.economy: Boris Johnson promises Wales a multi-million pound boost
issues.environment: TACKLING THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY TOGETHER: We have been living beyond our planet’s means and we need to act to prevent further damage.
issues.government: A vote for Labour means another hung parliament.
issues.health: NHS long-term plan: Focus on prevention ‘could save 500,000 lives’
issues.labourEmployment: Fay has spent over 11 years working on behalf of Welsh agriculture.
issues.lawCrime: End of the soft prison sentence

politicalExperience.achievements: Deliver better broadband and mobile coverage.
